technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant recalled feeling scared and concerned during the early stages of the pandemic.
communal_orientation: The participant engaged in conversation with their partner and showed concern for their experiences.
engagement: The participant was very engaged in the conversation and actively listened to their partner.
defensiveness: The participant did not display any defensive behaviors or statements.
questions: Did you get any subsequent shots after your initial ones?
vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are extremely important.
booster_importance: The participant believes that boosters are extremely important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a good amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and analyzing the situation.
general_notes: The participant is very open and willing to share their experiences.
